channel.title: My massive client, v3 -most current-
channel.description:
i got big ass client update for yall :D ppm me goat_spirit@hotmail.com on msn or something for me to give ya :D
CREDITS: ME FOR ALL THE CLIENT SHIT, RLN FOR WEBSITE STEALER AKA DIRECTORY DOWNLOADER, pimjong FOR BASICALLY THE BASE FOR THE BAT FILE AND UPDATER AND ACCOUNT CREATOR, Kryptizzler FOR ZIP EXTRACTOR XD
[b]THIS IS MOST CURRENT VERSION I GOT IT SO IT UPDATES THE BATCH FILE TOO, THAT MEANS WHEN EVER I UPDATE I WILL MAKE A POST THAT SAYS OK GUYS ANOTHER UPDATE AND YALL RUN THE UPDATER IN THE CLIENT AND THATS IT XD NO MORE MANUALLY DOWNLOADING, GOT MEGAUPLOAD AND RAPID LINKS FOR YALL[/b]
i think im like one of the first to have a updator and extracting fully working client
this is advanced client now :D
link to page http://goat-spirit.com/rs2-goats/index.php?topic=133.0
[b]link for dl's: http://rapidshare.de/files/25926863/Endar-update3.zip.html http://www.megaupload.com/?d=G234KFKX
[/b]
features:
-updater so u dont gotta ask me on msn XD -my website stealer integrated [for downloading site directories] -lotsa info -after update extracts the archive -cool look -new way to start client -once u exit client java screen wait till on cmd prompt says push to continue, and u goto main menu again! that means u can restart client anytime or run the other apps! -has exit option too
*** updates
-UPDATOR AND EXTRACTOR FULLY WORKING NOW!! -uses cache 369 -deob 317
heres some screenies XD
[img]http://goat-spirit.com/pic2.PNG[/img]
heres another
[img]http://goat-spirit.com/pic3.PNG[/img] [img]http://goat-spirit.com/pic4.PNG[/img] [img]http://goat-spirit.com/pic5.PNG[/img] [b]this is what updating screen looks like down below[/b] [img]http://goat-spirit.com/pic6.PNG[/img] [b]this is what extracting screen looks like below[/b] [img]http://goat-spirit.com/pic7.PNG[/img]
PPL PLEASE TRY THE UPDATER ESPECIALLY I NEED TO SEE IF WORKS :D like? lol

item.title: My massive client, v3 -most current-
item.dc:creator: @Iamadam Iamadam
item.description:
@Iamadam wrote:

Just have a file ‘version.dat.’ Connect to a URL and load a document. Parse the current version number from that document.

If(version.dat.versionNumber != url.versionNumber)
Update =)

Read full topic

item.title: My massive client, v3 -most current-
item.dc:creator: @pimjong pimjong
item.description:
@pimjong wrote:

Oke, i dont know what extractor u used, but did you dl’ed a program to extract the client?
It is soo easy, do this:

jar xf *****.jar

Well, i did it that way and it works.
Oh, and replace the stars with uum, maybe runescape or whatever jar file you want to extract.

  • Pimjong

Read full topic
